profile.name: Pranita Paudel
profile.bio: A Bachelor's student in Computer Applications with a strong foundation in programming and web development. I’m adaptable, quick to learn, and eager to gain practical experience in Python development, web technologies, and related fields.

education.school: Hetauda School of Management and Social Sciences
education.details: Graduated with GPA 3.84. Completed coursework in Computer Science and Mathematics, providing a strong foundation for analytical and technical skills.

education.school: Hetauda School of Management and Social Sciences (Tribhuvan University)
education.details: Maintaining a GPA of 3.50 (current average). Active member of the IT Club, involved in collaborative tech initiatives and events. Completed coursework in C, Java, DotNet, OOP, web technologies, database systems, and DSA.

experience.description: Developed and optimized user interfaces with React, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented responsive designs, fixed UI bugs, integrated APIs, and collaborated with the backend team. Gained experience in frontend workflows and Git.

projects.title: To-do List Website
projects.description: Multiuser to-do list application built with Django and simple HTML/CSS.

projects.title: Blogging Website
projects.description: Simple blogging platform developed during a college hackathon using Django.

projects.title: Ecommerce Project
projects.description: An ecommerce website built with React, Node and MySQL.
